explains: v. 实现，成为现实；突然显现，奇怪地出现

sentences.en: A rebellion by radicals failed to materialize.
sentences.cn: 激进分子的一次叛乱未能实现。

sentences.en: Their much vaunted reforms did not materialize.
sentences.cn: 他们大肆吹嘘的改革并没有实现。

sentences.en: The promotion he had been promised failed to materialize.
sentences.cn: 答应给他晋升的许诺未能实现。
